member_organisations: Japanese government, central bank, Japanese leading companies and banks.
fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Taxation, Single market
head_office_address: Koami-cho Yaduda Bldg 9-9 Koami-cho, Nihombashi Chuo-ku
eu_initiatives:
Economic situation, especially how to make the growth stronger and more solid. 
 
JCIF Brussels research covers macro-economic analysis of euro-area.  In addition to that we issue reports covering real time Euro area policy developments.  All of our reports are based on interviews and other reliable sources (publications such as Europe Daily Bulletin and others, press conferences, Brussels Economic Forum, ...)  For the interviews our staff regulary exchanging views with staff of following DG: 
Economic and Financial Affairs 
Internal Market 
Banking Union 
Competition
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
http://www.jcif.or.jp/ 
 
Our reports are available online to our membership and registered individuals such as academic researchers.  Our reports are in Japanese.
goals__remit: To research economic and financial situation of major countries as well as to keep abreast of development regulations and international treaties.  The outcome of the research is shared among members of our organisation, and is expected members to understand better the situation of countries where those companies have or will have businesses.
